document.full_text: the united states and other world powers urged south and north sudan on tuesday to return to talks over the looming division of the country, and to control armed groups blamed for recent attacks.
document.title: north, south sudan urged to resume separation talks
lines_and_colors: the united states and other world powers urged south and north sudan on tuesday to return to talks over the looming division of the country, and to control armed groups blamed for recent attacks.
